Alert Name: bush
House passes gas price-gouging bill
The profiteering bill aims at preventing gas stations from running up prices that are 'unconscionably excessive.'
05/23/07 04:09 PM, EDT
The Democrat-led House approved legislation Wednesday that would give the Federal Trade Commission more authority to probe price profiteering from gasoline and other refined products.
